meta.title: Privacy Policy - Autyvo
meta.description: Privacy policy for Autyvo services published by CarDoc SAS

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
content: The company CarDoc (hereinafter "CarDoc", "we") publishes and operates the digital services Autyvo (mobile application and website). We are fully committed to protecting your personal data and complying with applicable regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
This policy transparently informs you about the collection, use, storage, security and your rights regarding personal data processed through Autyvo.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.address: Registered office: 1 rue de la No√©, 44300 Nantes, France
controller.dpo: The Data Protection Officer (DPO) can be reached at:

conclusion.title: Your data is valuable
conclusion.content: We are committed to protecting it with the highest level of security and transparency. For any questions regarding this policy, please feel free to contact us.
